My Photography gears

September 3, 2022

Photography is not about gears—but gears matter.

To me, D850 is the most important one. As a full-frame 135 DSLR, it satisfies all the performance I need (both photography performance and controlling performance). F mount provides me with the ability to connect the world most versatile and reliable lens group. From 1950s to now.

NIKON D850
